title: Ireland seeks patient voices for new rare disease strategy oversight group [Advocacy Lab]
summary_full: Rare disease treatment in Ireland has suffered from a lack of real-life patient experience input, the government wants to improve the patient pathway with a new ‘equitable’ system
summary_public: Rare disease treatment in Ireland has suffered from a lack of real-life patient experience input, the government wants to improve the patient pathway with a new ‘equitable’ system
